billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Provides for an increase in federal itemized deduction for home improvements which promote water quality
summary: Provides for an increase in federal itemized deduction for certain home improvements; a fifty percent tax exemption is provided to a residential property owner of a one, two or three family home for improvements that will promote environmental quality; limits the deduction to $1,000 in any one tax year.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to modifications increasing federal itemized deductions for home improvements
